description:
Fortunately, she has the chance to come back to life. Help the kitten pass all the tests and defeat the guardians, keepers of the 3 pieces of her soul. Do you accept the challenge?

- 30 game levels.
- Simple puzzles of increasing difficulty.
- Mini game with hidden ships.
- Unlockable challenges and difficult mode for the most skillful.
- Wonderful graphics and soundtrack.
name: Purrs In Heaven
